text:
No problem Cas. Nice to connect with you. Hope I can help! :)

Why don’t you tell me a little about what you’re hoping to get from having a mentor?

And throw out any questions you have about me or, well, anything at all that you want to ask about at this stage.

Looking forward to working with you.

Hey! I got into the digital world around 5 years ago using maya mainly, I recently graduated at London South Bank University and did an Internship at NextGen(programme in partner ship with several studios) I worked at MPC as Runner/Junior Generalist and I am currently working as Render Wrangler in Framestore London, so still part of the industry but being able to work on my portfolio inside a company! Which is a nice bonus haha!(: 

I mainly want to get into Environment Art, just always had a thing for it, I am experienced with 3D Environments but lack a lot of 2D skills, mainly Matte Painting and photoshop knowledge, so I’m currently trying to improve that by painting over CG renders. 

My work I have on my website is quite outdated but I’m gonna upload some more recent stuff on it when it is finished:

<https://casvdbergh.weebly.com|https://casvdbergh.weebly.com>

Thank you, looking forward to working with you too! I went on LinkedIn and saw you did a lot of concept art! Which is just amazing as I don’t  see a lot of people doing that in this industry!

attachments.title: MY SITE
attachments.text: My name is Cas van den Bergh and I was born and raised in The Netherlands, and I am currently living in London.   I have created this portfolio to display my work for Visual Effects and...

text: I didn’t read the question correctly haha sorry! What I’m hoping is to get feedback on the work I’m doing and to see if you can keep me to finish work on a schedule haha! As sometimes I get busy sometimes and leave my portfolio and not work on it for few days! And ofc feedback is the best thing ever in this industry!
